name: Dinari SNOW
description: The Dinari SNOW dShares token (SNOW.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Snowflake Inc. (NYSE: SNOW), a leading cloud computing and data warehousing company. Snowflake provides a cloud-based platform that enables businesses to store, manage, and analyze massive amounts of data efficiently. Each SNOW.d token is fully backed by a corresponding SNOW stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, SNOW.d provides investors with exposure to one of the fastest-growing enterprise cloud computing companies, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
